refresh_failed_to_load: Failed to load! Click to try again!
input_memos: Enter the mnemonic, separated by spaces
input_pwd_wrong: Password does not match, please re-enter
input_pwd_regexp: Password should not be less than 8 characters. It is recommended to mix upper and lower case letters, numbers and special symbols
import_prvwrong: The private key you entered is incorrect
createwallet_tip1: 1. I know and understand that all assets in Consensus are stored in the phone, not the company that developed Consensus.
createwallet_tip2: 2. I know and understand that according to the design principles of Consensus, Consensus does not store the user's wallet password. If you forget your wallet password, you will not be able to retrieve your wallet password. At the same time, if I forget the mnemonic, then I will lose all the assets in Consensus.
createwallet_tip3: 3. I know and understand that when I delete the APP or log in to the APP on a new device or forget the wallet password, all the assets in Consensus can only be retrieved through the mnemonic I backed up.
createwallet_tip4: 4. I know and understand that I have not properly kept the wallet password and mnemonic phrase, and the loss of assets caused by forgetting the wallet password shall be borne by me and has nothing to do with Consensus.
createwallet_next: I fully understand the above rules and risks
createwallet_toptip: When using Consensus for the first time, you need to set the wallet password. A wallet password is required for on-chain transactions.
input_pwdagain: Please enter your wallet password again
input_pwdtip: Password hint, not required, displayed when the password is entered incorrectly
createwallet_warningvalue: Consensus does not store the user's wallet password, please be sure to keep your wallet password! The wallet password is used to encrypt your private key, and it is also important to use a secure and confidential password policy.
createwallet_createnext: I have kept the wallet password properly
create_wallet_exist: Wallet {walletname} has been created, please do not import again
backup_memoowner: Obtaining a mnemonic is equivalent to having wallet assets
backup_memotype: The mnemonic is composed of English letters, please keep the mnemonic properly. If the mnemonic is lost and cannot be retrieved, please be sure to back up the mnemonic
dialog_noscreenshotstips: Do not share and save screenshots, they may be collected by third-party malware, resulting in asset theft
backup_pleasewrite: Please write down the mnemonic, to make sure the backup is correct.
backupmemo_warningvalue: Save the mnemonic phrase in a safe place away from the Internet. Do not share and store the mnemonic phrase in a network environment, such as emails, photo albums, cloud drives, social apps, etc.
backupmemo_next: I have completed the backup, pending verification
verifymemo_nextclick: Please click on the mnemonic in order, to confirm that you backed up correctly.
verifymemo_verifystate: I confirm that everything is correct
verifymemo_verifwrong: The order of the mnemonic is wrong, please check whether the mnemonic is correct
walletssetting_oldpwdhint: Please enter the old wallet password
walletssetting_againnewpwdhint: Please enter the new password again
minepage_feedbacktip: We attach great importance to your experience, do you have any good comments or suggestions?
tokensetting_searchtip: Enter token name or contract address
tokensetting_sortindex: Wallet displays assets in the following order
tokensetting_longpresssort: Long press and drag to sort
paymenttip_ethnotenough: Main currency balance is not enough to pay the handling fee
minepage_modifytestnet: After modification to TestNet, all tokens and NFT in the wallet are test chain data.
dapppage_nextjump: You are about to jump to a third-party application
dapppage_warningtip: Tip: The page you are about to visit belongs to {dappName}, and its 'User Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy' will be applied when using it. {dappName} is directly and solely responsible for you.
dapppage_chooseright: Please select the corresponding chain wallet
homepage_backuptip: You have not backed up the mnemonic phrase. The mnemonic phrase can be used to restore wallet assets due to loss of assets caused by forgetting passwords, deleting apps, losing mobile phones, etc.
payment_valueshouldlessbal: The transfer amount needs to be less than the balance
customtokens_pleasetokencontract: Please enter the token contract address
payment_trontip: The TRON network stipulates that when transferring money to an inactive TRX address, at least 0.1TRX must remain in the transfer address as the handling fee, otherwise the transfer will fail.
paymenttip_sameaddress: Under the Tron network, you cannot transfer money to yourself
